item.title: HowTo: Automate nmap scanning
item.description: Recently a colleague of mine at nullsecurity.net released a new scanning tool called wnmap. Basically it’s a wrapper around nmap which helps automating the scanning process by using simple configuration files. Let’s have a look at it.. Configuration Make sure you you have downloaded the archive and open src/core/wnmap.conf in order to edit: the wnmap path editor preferences global parameters (to use in every scan) Running the tool Now the obligatory -help message:
